alert.note: Alert for Gooding (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 21 at 4:41PM MDT until August 21 at 8:45PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Gooding County in south central Idaho... * Until 845 PM MDT. * At 441 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding along Clover Creek. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Areas along Clover Creek in Northwestern Gooding County FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
